pullRequest.title: Add a gradle properties file with more retries and default parallel build
pullRequest.bodyText:
sets default to parallel builds, we typically want to enable that
for faster builds as a number of sub-projects can be built in parallel.
Of note, any tests that could conflict should all be confined to
a single sub-project, we should then be okay from test non-determinism


increases gradle dependency retry count and increases back off time.
With luck this will help reduce transient failures we see on a regular
basis in CI builds downloading artifacts.



Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[] Feature Removal
[] Code Cleanup or refactor
[x] Configuration Change
[x] Problem fix:  
[] Other:   
Testing
Quick smoke-testing running a ./gradlew compileJava and test




Additional Review Notes
The retry increase hopefully will help with CI build issues we are seeing: #6208

commit.message:
Add a gradle properties file

- sets default to parallel builds, we typically want to enable that
  for faster builds as a number of sub-projects can be built in parallel.
  Of note, any tests that could conflict should all be confined to
  a single sub-project, we should then be okay from test non-determinism

- increases gradle dependency retry count and increases back off time.
  With luck this will help reduce transient failures we see on a regular
  basis in CI builds downloading artifacts.

nodes.bodyText: Uhhm I believe you mistyped the name of this file

commit.message: Fix typo in gradle.properties file name
